siteMetadata.title: Sakshi Suman | Graduate Student - Applied Mathematics | Aspiring Machine Learning Engineer
siteMetadata.description: An aspiring Machine Learning Engineer. I'm looking for internships and co-ops in Machine Learning/Data Science starting Summer 2022.
siteMetadata.about: I'm pursuing a master's degree in Applied Mathematics at Northeastern University - College of Science with a concentration in Machine Learning and Statistics. My primary strength is Data Structure & Algorithm Implementation. Besides this, I hold a strong background in Linear Algebra, Calculus, Probability & Statistics. I'm looking for a long term career in Machine Learning.
siteMetadata.author: @sakshisuman12
